summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds for street/alley purposes and a sanitary sewer easement in portions of Bonnie Brae, Commercial Street Steam Motor Addition, Supplementary Plat of Pontius Second Addition to the City of Seattle, and A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition to the City of Seattle, laying off 7th Avenue Northwest, the alley in Block 33, Commercial Street Steam Motor Addition, the alley in Block 47, Supplementary Plat of Pontius Second Addition, Third Avenue South, East Thomas Street, Minor Avenue, East Union Street and the alley in Block 125, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition (RW 8801-8, RW 8925, RW 8926 and RW 8934).
